title: The Shawshank Redemption
content: An iconic film about hope and friendship. Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
content: A masterpiece of filmmaking. The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
content: A non-linear crime film that redefined independent cinema in the 90s. The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
